# KS Transport Flutter App - Workspace Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a Flutter mobile application for KS Transport - a logistics and transportation management system.

## Project Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Flutter project structure
- [x] Create pubspec.yaml with dependencies
- [x] Create main.dart and app structure
- [x] Create screens and widgets
- [x] Install Flutter dependencies
- [x] Create README.md

## Development Guidelines
- Follow Flutter best practices and Material Design guidelines
- Use proper state management
- Keep widgets modular and reusable
- Follow Dart naming conventions
